title: Strengthening Radiation Therapy Physics Practical Competencies via a Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized PBL course emphasizing real-time collaboration and step-by-step problem-solving, conducted in three 20-minute sessions per week

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three types of cancer treatment scenarios using a radiation therapy planning simulation tool.
Learners can interpret linear accelerator output data with over 85% accuracy by applying Monte Carlo modeling concepts.
Learners can identify five major error cases occurring during the reverse treatment planning process and propose correction strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
